    C

    ClassificationLevel - Enum Class in kp.resource.server.a.model
    Represents four classification levels, ordered from the weakest to the strongest classification.
    CONFIDENTIAL - Enum constant in enum class kp.resource.server.a.model.ClassificationLevel
    Confidential - A higher classification level, indicating sensitive information requiring strict access restrictions.

    S
